# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Advanced SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Engineering APC unit Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units current Load* (W). - Check that the remaining APC's Breakers are toggled on. - Check the APC units current Load* (W).
## 1.2. SKR CR-class Z-pinch nuclear fusion reactor.
- [color=#e9d502][bold]Wear protective equipment due to radiation leakeage.[/bold][/color] - Check that the generator unit is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the generator unit. - Set the generator unit output power to 60 kW. - Toggle the radiation collectors ON. - Enable Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to the BLUE connector port. - Check that the N2 canister is anchored to the RED connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (~22% Oxygen, ~78% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101.325kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Recommended to have basic anomaly knowledge to utilize the ship to it's fullest capabilities, additional tesla coils and rods have been provided to satisfy any power needs in case the vessel is upgraded, base model utilizes around 75kw up to 90kw with normal usage.
